title: Drug-fuelled dance trip in Noe's film "Climax" at Cannes
text:
Drug-fuelled dance trip in Noe's film "Climax" at Cannes 12:52pm EDT - 01:22
Argentine director Gaspar Noe's latest film 'Climax' took audiences in Cannes on an LSD infused dance trip into violence and horror. Rough cut (No reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
